Content:: Johnny Ace Watson (January 11, 1949 – July 2, 2022) was an American football offensive lineman who played nine seasons in the NFL for the San Francisco 49ers and New Orleans Saints. He played college football at the University of Oklahoma.[1] Born in Palo Alto, California, Watson died of Alzheimer's at age 73 in Oklahoma City, Oklahoma.[2]  This biographical article relating to an American football offensive lineman born in the 1940s is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
